plays.text: Penalty to Shawn Horcoff 2 minutes for Hooking Nicklas Lidstrom
Penalty to Marty Reasoner 2 minutes for Hooking Daniel Cleary
Goal scored by Henrik Zetterberg (Power Play) assisted by Mathieu Schneider and Nicklas Lidstrom
Penalty to Marc-Antoine Pouliot 2 minutes for Roughing Jason Williams
Goal scored by Tomas Holmstrom (Power Play) assisted by Nicklas Lidstrom and Mathieu Schneider
Penalty to Danny Markov 2 minutes for Hooking Ales Hemsky
Goal scored by Ryan Smyth (Power Play) assisted by Patrick Thoresen and Shawn Horcoff
Penalty to Niklas Kronwall 2 minutes for Interference Joffrey Lupul
Penalty to Raffi Torres 2 minutes for Roughing Niklas Kronwall
Penalty to Brett Lebda 2 minutes for Hooking Ryan Smyth
nan
Penalty to Petr Sykora 2 minutes for Cross checking Henrik Zetterberg
Penalty to Nicklas Lidstrom 2 minutes for Slashing Ryan Smyth
Penalty to Jason Smith 2 minutes for Elbowing Kris Draper
Goal scored by Raffi Torres assisted by Patrick Thoresen and Jan Hejda
Goal scored by Valtteri Filppula assisted by Jiri Hudler and Josh Langfeld
Penalty to Kirk Maltby 2 minutes for Roughing(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Raffi Torres 2 minutes for Roughing Kirk Maltby
Penalty to Jason Williams 2 minutes for Tripping Marc-Antoine Pouliot
Goal scored by Marty Reasoner assisted by Marc-Antoine Pouliot
Henrik Zetterberg shootout attempt against Dwayne Roloson with a Wide of Net results in a MISS.
Ryan Smyth shootout attempt against Dominik Hasek with a Snapshot results in a GOAL.
Pavel Datsyuk shootout attempt against Dwayne Roloson with a Wide of Net results in a MISS.
Ales Hemsky shootout attempt against Dominik Hasek with a Hit Goalpost results in a MISS.
Jason Williams shootout attempt against Dwayne Roloson with a Wide of Net results in a MISS.
